manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dimmable Lighting and 3 colour lihgts Building in 56 high brightness LEDs with warm light, nature light and white light 3 colour lights. Long press to dimmer light and touch to swith the light colour. 10X magnification is great for everything that needs to see more detail. For example, doing makeup, removing contacts, putting on lipstick, eyeliner, eyebrow tweezing, contact lens placement, mascara, and eye shadow.

Updated 56 Brighter Led Lights This cosmetic makeup mirror with lights built in 56pcs adjustable led lights which natural and soft, bright but not dazzling, can light the most dark and poorly lit areas,led lights for mirror helping you achieve a flawless professional makeup. 1X /10X Magnifying Mirror This 10X magnifying mirror lets you do precise facial treatment more easily, such as making up, shaving, deep facial-cleaning, plucking eyebrows, blackhead/blemish removal and wearing contact lenses. Ideal Gift for Her The makeup light mirror is an ideal gift for lovers, mothers, friends on Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving or other special occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact magnifying mirror. Perfect for travel.
reviews.reviewText: Reviews that said it was impossible to open?? NOT! If you try to open it backwards, maybe. The metal-look side is a hinge, not a clasp. Open from the opposite side of the hinge. Mirrors are great and has two brightness levels. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy, good quality build, a bit awkward to set up
reviews.reviewText: I've waffled for years about buying one of these small lighted magnifying mirrors. This one works great. As others mentioned, the hinges don't stay open on their own so you have to Macgyver a setup, but it's also an affordable product, so you're not getting all the luxe features. Great magnification, great lighting. My eyes are bad enough I used to have to wear magnifying glasses to pluck unwanted hairs, and still couldn't see everything because our bathroom lighting is terrible. This mirror takes care of that issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for traveling
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for my suitcase, and lighting options are good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very well made beautiful design.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mirror before I had my cataracts removed and new lenses placed in my eyes. Now I don’t need the 10 x power that I did before, but it is still a great mirror. The light is very bright and recharges with USB cord included. I would recommend this mirror to others who have hard time seeing well enough to tweeze eyebrow hairs etc. well balanced and easy to handle. It comes in a soft pouch to keep it from getting scratched. Very beautiful classy looking item. I hope they have one I can purchase with less powerful magnification now. If they do, I’m ordering another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent-a little heavy
reviews.reviewText: It's a little heavy but sturdy feeling. It's somewhat easier to open than another one I had by a different brand. The lights are excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Compact Size for Travel
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for my granddaughter. Nice quality compact mirror. She travels quite a bit. She was very happy with it. Will come in handy!Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift. Mirrors are nice and lighting works well. Comes with protective pouch and charge cord. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No wonky eyeliner!
reviews.reviewText: I never realized just how important this mirror was going to be until I tried putting makeup on in my Vegas hotel. Not only was the lighting horrible in the room, but the bathroom had even more miserable lighting! Thing is- the lighting in the casino is waaay better so any wrong color combo or shaky eyeliner lines WILL BE NOTICEABLE.So- get this mirror. The 3 light settings let you choose what works best for you. You can even just turn the mirror on and use the light with a larger makeup mirror (which, I also did in a pinch). My close vision sucks, so the 10x magnification is a godsend. Even better- the light automatically goes off when you shut the compact. It’s a wee bit challenging to open as there’s not a latch, and it’s not as light as a regular compact mirror.Overall- worth the price. Highly recommend.

Un artículo muy adecuado por su tamaño y peso para cargar en el bolsillo y el aumento en el espejo. Excelente para los que estamos un poco cortos de la vista. Es un excelente opción para maquillarte su imagen, muy nítida. Excelente
El paquete llegó a tiempo en buenas condiciones, el espejo se ve de buena calidad, tiene 3 tipos de luz ( luz blanca, luz amarilla, luz tenue ) la batería le dura bastante,
excelente producto y la calidad ni hablar.
Un espejo perfecto para viajar.Compacto y muy bien aumento.
